SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Main application class that serves as the entry point for the SVG shapes management program.
Circle
Represents a circle shape in SVG format.
CloseFile
Command implementation that closes the currently opened SVG file.
Command
Represents a command that can be executed with string arguments.
CommandManager
Manages the execution of commands in the SVG shapes application.
CommandType
Enum representing the types of commands supported by the application.
CreateShape
Command implementation for creating different types of SVG shapes.
EraseShape
Command implementation for erasing a shape from the SVG canvas by index.
ExitProgram
Command implementation for exiting the application.
HelpMenu
Command implementation for displaying the list of supported commands and their usage.
InputParser
Utility class for parsing user input values safely.
Line
Represents a line shape in SVG format.
NegativeValueChecker
Utility class for checking if numeric values are negative.
NegativeValueException
Exception thrown when a negative value is provided where it is not allowed.
OpenFile
Command implementation for opening an existing SVG file or creating a new one.
Point
Represents a point in the Coordinate system with x and y coordinates.
Pointer
Interface for objects that have one or more defining points.
Polygon
Represents a polygon shape in SVG format.
PrintShapes
Command implementation for printing all shapes currently on the SVG canvas.
PrintShapesWithin
Command implementation for printing all shapes in the canvas within a specified circle or rectangle.
Rectangle
Represents a rectangle shape in SVG format.
SaveAsAnotherFile
Command implementation for saving the current canvas to a new file.
SaveFile
Command implementation for saving changes to the currently opened SVG file.
ShapesFile
Utility class for managing the currently opened SVG file in the application.
ShapeType
Enum representing the types of shapes supported by the application.
SVGCanvas
Singleton class that represents an SVG canvas containing a collection of SVG shapes.
SVGFileWriter
Utility class responsible for writing SVG shapes to a file in valid SVG format.
SVGFormatter
Interface for objects that can be converted to SVG format.
SVGParser
Utility class for parsing SVG shape definitions from a file and converting them into corresponding Java objects.
SVGShape
Abstract base class representing an SVG shape.
TranslateShape
Command implementation for translating a specific shape or all shapes on the canvas.
